title: 菲律賓男籃教練抱怨中菲戰香港籍裁判：香港也是中國領土，不公平！

replies.msg:
https://www.rappler.com/sports/specials/asian-games/210161-basketball-philippine-team-yeng-guiao-slams-referee-choice-after-loss






日前，亞運男子籃球小組賽，大熱門中國以82比80，2分之微力克由NBA騎士球星克拉遜領軍的菲律賓。賽後，菲律賓男籃主帥抱怨之前亞運會中國對菲律賓的裁判安排，他認為此役安排來自香港的裁判是不恰當的。

“讓一個來自於香港的裁判吹罰這場比賽，香港也是中國的領土，他們有39次罰球而我們就15個，我覺得不能讓香港籍裁判執法中國隊的比賽。”


JAKARTA, Indonesia – The Philippine basketball coach said a referee from "Chinese territory" should not have officiated his side's narrow loss to China at the Asian Games, querying the number of fouls his side was awarded.

A Philippines side bolstered by newly arrived NBA star Jordan Clarkson was pipped 82-80 in the thrilling match on Tuesday, August 21, after China scored two free throws awarded by the Hong Kong referee with just 13 seconds left.

"They let a Hong Kong referee, which is also Chinese territory, referee against us," said Yeng Guiao. "And they gave them 39 free throws and they gave us only 15, no?"

"So I thought somebody from Hong Kong which is controlled by China should not referee a China game," Guaio told ABS-CBN on Wednesday, referring to chief official Yuen Chun Yip.

Hong Kong is a semi-autonomous Special Administrative Region of China, but competes separately at major sports events including the Olympics and Asian Games.

The loss leaves the Philippines relying on results elsewhere in their group to progress to the knockouts of Asia's regional Olympics.
